Util::SpeciesEnsemble Class Reference

Detailed Description

An ensemble for the number of molecules of one Species.

An SpeciesEnsemble has a type, which can be closed or grand. If the ensemble type is grand, it stores a chemical potential.

void Util::SpeciesEnsemble::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read the type and (if appropriate) mu from file.

Read the type and (if necessary) chemical potential mu from file.

The type is specified in the input file by a string literal "closed" or "grand".

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
